sites.name: note.space.bilibili.com
sites.title: [[{$('.note-single-item--selected .note-item__detail--title').text()||$('title').text()}]]
sites.include:
[[[(function(){var note=$('.ql-editor');if(note.length){if(note.text().length<100)note.append('

笔记内容过短，为避免阅读模式失败，自动填充内容。


'+''.padEnd(80,'#')+'

');}else{note=$('

未能获取到笔记内容，请确认是否存在笔记内容。


如在『稍后读 - 阅读模式』下见到此信息，请在笔记页面保存html，并启用稍后读设置中「优先加载本地的离线文件」功能。


'+''.padEnd(80,'#')+'

');$('head').append(note);}return note;}())]]]
exclude:
[[{(function(){if(!/bilibili.com/.test(window.location.hostname))return;var video_url=$('.note-single-item--selected a').attr('href');if(!/^http/.test(video_url))video_url='https://'+video_url.replace(/^[\/:]+/,'');var getAid=bv=>{var codeBy='https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/398535-bv2av/code';const table='fZodR9XQDSUm21yCkr6zBqiveYah8bt4xsWpHnJE7jL5VG3guMTKNPAwcF';const tr={};for(var i=0;i<58;++i){tr[table[i]]=i;};const s=[11,10,3,8,4,6];const xor=177451812;const add=8728348608;function bv2aid(bv){let r=0;for(let i=0;i<6;++i){r+=tr[bv[s[i]]]*(58**i);};return String((r-add)^xor);};return bv2aid(bv);};var aid='';if(/[ab]v\w+/i.test(video_url)){var bv=video_url.match(/[bB][vV][fZodR9XQDSUm21yCkr6zBqiveYah8bt4xsWpHnJE7jL5VG3guMTKNPAwcF]{10}/g);if(bv){aid=getAid(bv[0])}else{var av=video_url.match(/av(\d+)/i);if(av)aid=av[1];};};var title=$('sr-rd-title').text().trim();var div=$(`

视频链接：${title}

笔记链接：${title}

`);$('sr-rd-content').prepend(div);$('sr-rd-content div[data-seconds]').each(function(){var div=$(this);var time=div.find('div span').text();var p=div.attr('data-index');var t=div.attr('data-seconds');var url=video_url+`&p=${p}&t=${t}`;div.html(`

▶ ${time}

`);});$('sr-rd-content .ql-image-preview').removeAttr('style');$('sr-rd-content').children('div').contents().each(function(){if(this.nodeType===3)this.nodeValue=''});window.location.hash=title;})()}]]

');$('head').append(wrap);}return wrap;}())]]]
